translations.english: Pei Gong and Xiang Yu left to attack Dingtao.

translations.chinese: 八月，田榮立田儋子市為齊王。
translations.english: In the eighth month, Tian Rong established Tian Dan's son Shi as King of Qi.

translations.chinese: 定陶未下，沛公與項羽西略地至雍丘，與秦軍戰，大敗之，斬三川守李由。
translations.english: Dingtao had not yet fallen. Pei Gong and Xiang Yu marched west to seize territory as far as Yongqiu, where they battled Qin troops and greatly defeated them, beheading the governor of Sanchuan, Li You.
They returned to attack Waihuang, but Waihuang did not fall.
Xiang Liang defeated the Qin army again and showed arrogant bearing.
